TEXT.TITLE: EQUITABLE LIFE LEASING NAMES PRESIDENT
TEXT.BODY: Equitable Life Leasing Corp said it named Lawrence Johnes president and chief operating officer, effective April one. Johnes joined the company in November 1984 as executive vice president and chief financial officer. Edward Horman will continue as chairman and chief executive officer, the company said. Reuter
